channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Clustering ideas by topic with machine learning and generative AI
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: FigJam has a feature where you can automatically cluster sticky notes by topic. I wanted to see if I could glue some things together to implement this myself.</body></html>
